unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain News: Inventory Forecasting Takes Center Stage**
normalised: manufacturing and supply chain news: inventory forecasting takes center stage

unnormalised: Mumbai, India – October 26, 2023 – Indian manufacturers are increasingly prioritizing sophisticated inventory forecasting techniques to optimize their supply chains, reduce costs, and meet the rising demands of a dynamic market. A recent report by IIM Ahmedabad highlights the significant impact of AI-powered forecasting models in minimizing inventory holding costs by up to 15% in select sectors.
